bug.author: Ir1d
bug.summary: 404 in Left Sidebar of zh-cn doc
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/addons/api_docs/python/tfa/layers/InstanceNormalization>https://www.tensorflow.org/addons/api_docs/python/tfa/layers/InstanceNormalization</denchmark-link>
Check the changed into if you change the language from en to zh-CN <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10709657/75981291-2f469080-5f1f-11ea-9662-9e8145dfdb5a.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10709657/75981278-281f8280-5f1f-11ea-80a1-614aa309e3f6.png></denchmark-link>
Because the url is case-sensitive, it only works with <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/addons/api_docs/python/tfa/layers/GELU>GELU</denchmark-link> , so its a 404 in zh-cn docs. I tried to bring a fix but only found the toc file in v0.7.1 branch instead of master.

comments.comment:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Ir1d>@Ir1d</denchmark-link> thanks for the issue! I'm not quite following why this hyperlink would be different for the CN version. I tried changing my language and the link looks correct? <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18154355/76178697-9f0e8280-618e-11ea-833b-f4cd7a601330.png></denchmark-link>
++ <denchmark-link:https://github.com/MarkDaoust>@MarkDaoust</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/lamberta>@lamberta</denchmark-link> to see if this makes sense to them
I believe this is somehow fixed? I can't reproduce either.
I sent off a translation job for the _book.yaml files (nav) that just came back the other day. Usually translations can lag behind a bit. Should be up-to-date now.
